remarks: Write a double product as a product over a two-dimensional region. Compare ~ fsum2d .  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 30-Jan-2018.)
statement:
fprod2d.1 $e |- ( z = <. j , k >. -> D = C ) $.
fprod2d.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fprod2d.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ j e. A ) -> B e. Fin ) $.
fprod2d.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( j e. A /\ k e. B ) ) -> C e. CC ) $.
fprod2d $p |- ( ph -> prod_ j e. A prod_ k e. B C = prod_ z e. U_ j e. A ( { j } X. B ) D ) $.
$d A j k z $.
$d B k z $.
$d C z $.
$d D j k $.
$d j k ph z $.
